*30 spicy *10 dry *0 sweet *0 bitter *0 sour }} '''Spelon''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding a [[Tamato]] with at least 130, but no more than 160 points of spicy and no more than 80 points of all other flavours.
